name: CreateCustomAttributeConfig
description:
Create a custom attribute configuration for a specific case type.

Use this tool to create a custom attribute configuration in Datadog for a specified case type, enhancing data categorization and organization.

parameters.name: case_type_uuid
parameters.description: UUID of the case type for which the custom attribute config is to be created.

parameters.name: custom_attribute_display_name
parameters.description: The display name for the custom attribute.

parameters.name: custom_attribute_key
parameters.description: A string key used to search for the custom attribute. This is the identifier for the attribute.

value_schema.description: Custom attribute key. This will be the value use to search on this custom attribute

parameters.name: custom_attribute_type
parameters.description: Type of the custom attribute. Options: 'URL', 'TEXT', or 'NUMBER'.

parameters.name: custom_attributes_config_type
parameters.description: Specifies the JSON:API resource type for the custom attributes configuration. Must be 'custom_attribute'.

value_schema.description: Custom attributes config JSON:API resource type

parameters.name: allow_multiple_values
parameters.description: Indicates if multiple values can be set for the custom attribute.

value_schema.description: Whether multiple values can be set

parameters.name: custom_attribute_description
parameters.description: Detailed description for the custom attribute. This helps define the attribute's purpose and use.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.is_multi
parameters.description: Whether multiple values can be set

value_schema.description: Whether multiple values can be set

parameters.name: data.attributes.key
parameters.description: Custom attribute key. This will be the value use to search on this custom attribute

value_schema.description: Custom attribute key. This will be the value use to search on this custom attribute

parameters.name: data.type
parameters.description: Custom attributes config JSON:API resource type

value_schema.description: Custom attributes config JSON:API resource type
